issues.title: Требуется к оценке. Услуга 4. frontend
issues.description: Evaluation required for Service 4 - Credit Refinancing frontend implementation

youtrack_requirements.service_description: 4th of 4 main financial services - Credit refinancing calculator with 4-step flow
youtrack_requirements.complexity: High - Multi-step refinancing calculator with complex credit data management

service_structure_analysis.service_overview: Complete 4-step credit refinancing service with comprehensive functionality
steps_implemented: Step 1: Credit Refinancing Calculator with multiple credit data management
Step 2: Personal Data Collection (reused from other services)
Step 3: Income Data Collection (reused from other services)

technical_implementation.main_component: ✅ RefinanceCredit.tsx - Complete routing and step management
technical_implementation.redux_integration: ✅ refinanceCreditSlice with async thunk for API calls
technical_implementation.form_management: ✅ Formik integration with comprehensive validation schemas
technical_implementation.api_integration: ✅ refinanceCredit API endpoint with proper error handling
technical_implementation.state_management: ✅ updateRefinanceCreditData action for form state updates

step_1_calculator.component: ✅ FirstStep/FirstStepForm with complex credit data management
features: ✅ CreditData component for multiple credit management
✅ Dynamic credit addition/removal with ExitModule confirmation
✅ Bank selection dropdown with major Israeli banks
✅ Amount, monthly payment, start/end date inputs
✅ Early repayment calculation (conditional based on purpose)
step_1_calculator.validation: ✅ Complex validation including credit data array validation

step_2_personal_data.component: ✅ SecondStep - Reuses existing personal data forms

step_3_income_data.component: ✅ ThirdStep - Reuses existing income forms with modals

features: ✅ UserParams component for displaying refinancing parameters
✅ Filter component for bank offer filtering
step_4_bank_offers.bank_calculation: ✅ Enhanced credit refinance calculation in backend

calculation_features: ✅ Total interest savings over loan term
backend_integration.bank_integration: ✅ Support for Bank Hapoalim, Leumi, Discount, Mizrahi banks

translation_keys: ✅ credit_refinance_* keys for all refinancing terms
✅ Comprehensive error messages and validation texts

ui_ux_features.accessibility: ✅ ARIA labels and keyboard navigation support

minor_issues: ⚠️ FourthStepForm UserParams missing credit parameter binding
⚠️ Some commented code in Redux state selectors
⚠️ BankOffers component hardcoded test data for some parameters
technical_debt: 📝 API integration could use more comprehensive error handling
📝 Form state persistence between steps could be improved
📝 Loading states could be more granular per step

business_logic_evaluation.risk_assessment: ✅ DTI ratio and credit score impact analysis
business_logic_evaluation.bank_matching: ✅ Intelligent bank recommendation based on profile

integration_quality.component_reuse: ✅ Excellent reuse of shared components across services
integration_quality.routing_integration: ✅ Proper integration with main routing system

immediate_fixes: Fix UserParams credit parameter binding in FourthStepForm
Remove commented code and clean up Redux selectors
Replace hardcoded test data with dynamic parameter binding
enhancements: Add more granular loading states for each step
Implement form state persistence between browser sessions
Add more comprehensive error handling for API failures
Consider adding comparison charts for refinancing benefits
business_improvements: Add real-time interest rate updates from bank APIs
Implement notification system for rate changes
Add document upload functionality for refinancing applications
Create refinancing timeline and milestone tracking
